name: Bigfoot Found
description:
You find undeniable proof of Bigfoot! How will you and Society react? 

Made as part of the Global Game Jam -Jan 27-31, 2021.  Theme: Lost and Found

You play a Bigfoot researcher who finally finds the real Bigfoot. Decide how you will publish your findings to the world and how society will react to the news. Click once to advance the story and select choices by clicking on them with the mouse. 

I had so much fun making this game! Future builds will include more drawings and music. I also want to work on my writing. The web based build doesn't work quite right so I have to work on that. 

*note some of the subject matter is recommended for mature audiences (12+). Some storylines contain violence.
